settings.caption: Our
settings.heading: Snuggle-Soft Fabric
settings.text: Short Stuff' story began with our founder Roxanne's quest to find the softest fabric for your little one. Today, we focus on creating innovative materials that bring comfort and learning to our little ones. Crafted from bamboo, our signature fabrics are designed to make every moment cozier and brighter.

settings.caption: See the
settings.heading: Benefits
settings.text:
• Eczema and sensory friendly
  • Seasonless (you can wear it all year round)
  • Our proprietary bamboo fabric is soft, breathable and moisture wicking.
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Stretches to fit 3X longer.

settings.caption: We make it
settings.heading: Convenient
settings.text:
• Late night diaper changes- meet our double zipper!
  • For warm feet and scratch free cheeks?- Meet our fold-over cuffs and mittens.
  • Want to pass our clothing down from one kid to another?- We are made to last and are hand me down friendly!
  • We are gender neutral and grow with your little one!
